abstract: A computer systems technician secretly taped calls with a reporter for The Times, a spokeswoman said.
snippet: A computer systems technician secretly taped calls with a reporter for The Times, a spokeswoman said.
lead_paragraph: Federal investigators are looking into the actions of a computer systems technician at Wal-Mart Stores who, over a period of several months, intercepted pager and text messages and also secretly taped telephone conversations between Wal-Mart employees and a reporter for The New York Times, the company said yesterday.

headline.main: Wal-Mart Says Worker Taped Reporter’s Calls

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: Wiretapping and Other Eavesdropping Devices and Methods
